amendment.description: To increase funding for the National Institutes of Health.

action.text: Amendment SA 1622 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1622 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 346.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1622.
Amendment SA 1622 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11309-11311, S11311-11315; text: CR S11309-11310) To increase funding for the National Institutes of Health.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1622 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 346.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1622 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 1542.
